::Killfest::

Killfest frowns, looking behind him at the sound of the 
explosion. "EndBringer.."

"Sorry, Killfest," the half-insane bot replies, sitting down in a 
chair again. Killfest turns back to Darkmouse.

"My apologies about that. EndBringer is easily bored."

He activates his link to Blacknightmare. "Blacknightmare, this is 
Killfest. I am interested in a temporary alliance between your group 
and mine. If you are interested, report to my quarters, room 1468."

He terminates the transmission and looks at Darkmouse. "Anyone else 
that could help?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> 
> "That bat thing, er, what did the compter call it? blacknightmare. 
> Get her to.." She fell out of her chair as she jumped from the 
> explosion. "WHAT THE SLAG!?!?"
